alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 3:20PM EDT until August 07 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cherokee County in north central Georgia... East central Bartow County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 320 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sutallee, or 9 miles east of Cartersville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Holly Springs, Ball Ground, Waleska, Buffington, Hickory Flat, Union Hill, Lake Arrowhead, Red Top Mountain State Park, Little River Landing, Lathemtown, Sutallee, and Bridgemill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
